quote: That's the thing. You come back and you expect everyone to be just the way they were when you left. But it's not that easy, okay? You can't just force us all to be how you liked us.
quote_letters: THATS THE THING YOU COME BACK AND YOU EXPECT EVERYONE TO BE JUST THE WAY THEY WERE WHEN YOU LEFT BUT ITS NOT THAT EASY OKAY YOU CANT JUST FORCE US ALL TO BE HOW YOU LIKED US
